name: Pakala
short_description: Symbolic execution engine for smart contracts aimed at identifying logical flaws and vulnerabilities.

name: VeriSmart
short_description: Symbolic execution framework focused on the formal verification of Ethereum smart contracts.

name: RA
short_description: Tool for symbolic analysis of smart contracts with a focus on runtime behavior.

name: Manticore
short_description: Binary and smart contract symbolic execution tool developed by Trail of Bits.

name: Echidna
short_description: Smart contract fuzzer for property-based testing using Solidity assertions.

name: SoliAudit
short_description: Automated fuzzer for Solidity contracts used to find common security issues.

name: Medusa
short_description: High-coverage fuzzer for Ethereum smart contracts, part of the Crytic suite.

name: ItyFuzz
short_description: A highly customizable fuzzer for Ethereum smart contracts developed by Fuzzland.

name: EVMFuzzer
short_description: A fuzzing tool for discovering vulnerabilities in Ethereum Virtual Machine implementations.

name: sFuzz
short_description: Coverage-guided fuzzer designed to analyze Ethereum smart contracts.

name: EthVer
short_description: Formal verification tool for analyzing correctness of Ethereum smart contracts.

name: VeriSol
short_description: Microsoft’s formal verification tool for Ethereum smart contracts using symbolic execution and theorem proving.

name: Halmos
short_description: Framework by a16z that provides formal reasoning and model checking for smart contracts.

name: Mythril
short_description: Popular symbolic analysis tool used for vulnerability detection in Ethereum smart contracts.

name: Maian
short_description: Analysis tool for identifying trace vulnerabilities in Ethereum contracts, such as suicidal or leaking contracts.

name: Eth2Vec
short_description: A graph-based learning approach for analyzing Ethereum bytecode using vector embeddings.

name: FEther
short_description: Archived lightweight wallet for Ethereum nodes, allowing for easy contract interaction.

name: Gas Gauge
short_description: Web-based tool for visualizing and analyzing gas usage of Solidity functions.

name: NeuCheck
short_description: Tool developed by Northeastern University for automated smart contract analysis to identify critical vulnerabilities.

name: SIF
short_description: Security Inspection Framework for detecting bugs in Ethereum smart contracts.

name: Slither
short_description: Industry-standard static analysis framework that helps find vulnerabilities in Solidity codebases.

name: SmartBugs
short_description: Benchmarking and testing framework for smart contract vulnerability tools.

name: SmartCheck
short_description: Static analysis tool for Solidity code that converts smart contracts into an XML-based intermediate representation.

name: SmartEmbed
short_description: Semantic-aware analysis tool for Ethereum bytecode focusing on similarity detection.

name: SolAnalyzer
short_description: Archived tool to identify issues in Solidity smart contracts using pattern recognition.

name: solhint
short_description: Linter for Solidity code that helps enforce coding style and catch programming errors.

name: SolidityCheck
short_description: Lightweight static analyzer for smart contracts written in Solidity.

name: EthIR
short_description: Intermediate representation tool for Ethereum bytecode used for static contract analysis.

name: HoneyBadger
short_description: Static analyzer focused on detecting honeypot contracts on Ethereum.

name: Osiris
short_description: Symbolic execution engine tailored for detecting integer bugs in smart contracts.

name: Oyente
short_description: One of the earliest symbolic execution tools for analyzing Ethereum contracts.

name: rattle
short_description: Static analysis framework to decompile and simplify Ethereum smart contract bytecode.

name: Securify v2.0
short_description: Advanced formal verification tool developed by ETH Zurich for detecting vulnerabilities in Ethereum smart contracts.

name: teEther
short_description: Exploitation tool for automatically finding inputs that trigger vulnerabilities in smart contracts.

name: Vandal
short_description: Framework for static analysis and decompilation of Ethereum smart contracts.

name: Conkas
short_description: Context-aware static analyzer for Ethereum smart contracts.

name: Aderyn
short_description: Security toolkit by Cyfrin for symbolic execution and static analysis of Solidity smart contracts.

name: AChecker
short_description: Formal analysis framework designed to verify security properties in smart contracts.
